import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {Form, Button, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import Message from "../components/Message" import Loader from "../components/Loader" import {login} from "../actions/userAction" import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer" export default function LoginScreen() { const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = () => {dispatchEvent(login())} // redirect to home page? const redirect = location.search? location.search.split("=")[1]: "/" return (

Sign In

Email Address {setEmail(e.target.value)}}> password {setPassword(e.target.value)}}>
New Customer? Register ) }
